biotools.summary: MetaTrass is abbreviation to Metagenomics Taxonomic Reads For Assembly Single Species. MetaTrass is based on high-quality referencess with taxonomic tree and long-range information encoded within co-barcoded short-read sequences. The comprehensive use of co-barcoding information and references in our approach can reduce the false negative effects of genome taxonomy to assembly high-quality metagenomes from the sequencing data.
